title: Everything MTERMS2026 Needs — Built In
intro: From abstracts to payments to post-event impact — modular, secure, and production-ready. This popup is a live preview of the full platform we can deliver.

tabs.label: Overview
bullets: Role-aware registration (Attendee, Speaker, Sponsor, Exhibitor, VIP, Student).
Hosted checkouts: Cards, Apple/Google Pay, FPX, PayPal.
Abstracts → Blind review → Conflict-free scheduling.
Capacity-aware agenda with smart waitlists.
Green-room tools for chairs & speakers.
Post-event media library with embargo windows.
tabs.footnote: This is a draft preview for evaluation; all data are placeholders.

tabs.label: Registration & Payments
bullets: Stripe Payment Links: cards + Apple/Google Pay + FPX.
PayPal & local gateways (ToyyibPay/Billplz) as alternatives.
Smart pricing: early-bird, member discounts, team bundles.
Self-service transfers + refund policy engine.
QR badges (PDF/Wallet) + offline fallback lists.

tabs.label: Abstracts & Review
bullets: Rich submissions (figures, keywords, conflicts).
Blind peer review with COI auto-flags.
Score matrices & reviewer discussion threads.
Auto-program builder creates conflict-free schedules.
Proceedings export (PDF/EPUB) with DOI stubs.

tabs.label: Program & Check-in
bullets: Live program with room capacities & seat counters.
Smart waitlists auto-backfill based on interest ranking.
Calendar ICS + reminders (email/WhatsApp opt-in).
Onsite check-in with QR + offline mode.
tabs.badges: Conference registration desk with large QR code for attendee check-in

tabs.label: Speakers & Media
bullets: Upload slides/video/poster, AV needs & consent in one place.
Auto checks: file type/size, embedded media scan.
Green-room: timers, chair signals, talk status feed.
Embargoed media unlock for attendees post-event.

tabs.label: Sponsors & Exhibitors
bullets: Package tracker (deliverables, logos, stage slots).
Exhibitor hub for services, freight, staff badges.
No-app lead capture via QR microsites + consent log.
Post-event exports & ROI dashboards.

tabs.label: Analytics & Sustainability
bullets: Dashboards: signups, revenue, abstract funnel, heatmaps.
Session popularity predictions & overflow alerts.
Sustainability metrics: paper saved, transit mix, offsets.
CSV exports for finance and reporting.

tabs.label: Security & Compliance
bullets: RBAC: Admin, Track Lead, Reviewer, Chair, AV, Finance, Volunteer.
PII minimization; TLS; encryption at rest for stored data.
Audit logs + exportable compliance pack (DPA template).
Regional hosting with backups.
